task.title: Iced Cold Coffee
task.shortdesc: Coffee is the perfect pairing with any breakfast meal

taskbody.context:
Coffee is easy to prepare especially this recipe!
Ingredients
1/2 cup of ground coffee (flavor is up to you)
4 cup of water
1 cup of whole milk or
1 cup of almond milk
1 tsp of Cinnamon
Ice cubes

step.cmd: Pour your ground coffee the top of the coffee machine.
Add 4 cups of water to the machine. Look for the compartment labeled "water".
Hit the on button to begin brewing coffee
Put coffee in a container and put it in the fridge. Let coffee cool a bit until it is chilled
Once coffee is cool, pour it into a glass
